channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- Synology Router Manager (SRM)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- Synology Router Manager (SRM)

item.title: CVE-2018-8918|2024-08-05T07:10:46.972Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in info.cgi in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.1.7-6941 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the host parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-13289|2024-08-05T09:00:34.485Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Information exposure vulnerability in SYNO.FolderSharing.List in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.1.7-6941-2 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information via the (1) folder_path or (2) real_path parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-13292|2024-08-05T09:00:34.334Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Information exposure vulnerability in /usr/syno/etc/mount.conf in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.1.7-6941-2 allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive information via the world readable configuration.

item.title: CVE-2018-13290|2024-08-05T09:00:34.544Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Information exposure vulnerability in SYNO.Core.ACL in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.1.7-6941-2 allows remote authenticated users to determine the existence of files or obtain sensitive information of files via the file_path parameter.

item.title: CVE-2018-13287|2024-08-05T09:00:34.595Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Incorrect default permissions vulnerability in synouser.conf in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.1.7-6941-1 allows remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive information via the world readable configuration.

item.title: CVE-2018-13285|2024-08-05T09:00:34.015Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Command injection vulnerability in ftpd in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.1.7-6941-1 allows remote authenticated users to execute arbitrary OS commands via the (1) MKD or (2) RMD command.

item.title: CVE-2024-39348|2024-08-02T04:26:14.241Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Download of code without integrity check vulnerability in AirPrint functionality in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.5-8227-11 and 1.3.1-9346-8 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-39347|2024-08-02T04:26:14.241Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Incorrect default permissions vulnerability in firewall functionality in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.5-8227-11 and 1.3.1-9346-8 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to access highly sensitive intranet resources via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-39348|2024-06-28T13:39:34.938Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Download of code without integrity check vulnerability in AirPrint functionality in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.5-8227-11 and 1.3.1-9346-8 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-39348|2024-06-28T06:30:57.973Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Download of code without integrity check vulnerability in AirPrint functionality in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.5-8227-11 and 1.3.1-9346-8 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to execute arbitrary code via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-39347|2024-06-28T06:30:10.727Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Incorrect default permissions vulnerability in firewall functionality in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.5-8227-11 and 1.3.1-9346-8 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to access highly sensitive intranet resources via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2024-39347|2024-07-02T16:39:01.301Z -- synology -- synology%20router%20manager%20%28srm%29
item.description: Incorrect default permissions vulnerability in firewall functionality in Synology Router Manager (SRM) before 1.2.5-8227-11 and 1.3.1-9346-8 allows man-in-the-middle attackers to access highly sensitive intranet resources via unspecified vectors.
